parameters.query:
INSERT INTO public.recursos
(company_name, "no", name, arbvrn_email, global_dimension1_code, calendario,
 fecha_de_baja, fecha_de_alta, subcontratacion, perfil,
 last_modified_datetime, updated_at)
SELECT
  $1,                 -- company_name
  $2,                 -- no
  $3,                 -- name
  NULLIF(btrim($4),''),  -- arbvrn_email, vacío → NULL
  $5,                 -- global_dimension1_code
  $6,                 -- calendario
  NULLIF(NULLIF($7::text,''),'0001-01-01')::date,  -- fecha_de_baja
  NULLIF(NULLIF($8::text,''),'0001-01-01')::date,  -- fecha_de_alta
  CASE WHEN $9::text IN ('true','1','t','yes') THEN true ELSE false END, -- subcontratacion
  $10,                -- perfil
  NULLIF($11::text,'')::timestamptz,               -- last_modified_datetime
  NOW()               -- updated_at
WHERE $2::text <> ''      -- no obligatorio
ON CONFLICT ("no")
DO UPDATE SET
  company_name           = EXCLUDED.company_name,
  name                   = EXCLUDED.name,
  arbvrn_email           = EXCLUDED.arbvrn_email,
  global_dimension1_code = EXCLUDED.global_dimension1_code,
  calendario             = EXCLUDED.calendario,
  fecha_de_baja          = EXCLUDED.fecha_de_baja,
  fecha_de_alta          = EXCLUDED.fecha_de_alta,
  subcontratacion        = EXCLUDED.subcontratacion,
  perfil                 = EXCLUDED.perfil,
  last_modified_datetime = EXCLUDED.last_modified_datetime,
  updated_at             = NOW()
RETURNING *;

parameters.responseBody: ={{ { "success": true, "message": "Recursos sincronizados exitosamente", "timestamp": new Date().toISOString(), "records_processed": $items("Transform Recursos").length } }}

parameters.jsCode:
const companyName = $items('Build Last Sync')[0]?.json?.companyName || '';
return [{ json: { companyName, nowIso: new Date().toISOString() } }];

parameters.query: INSERT INTO public.sync_state (company_name, entity, last_sync_at) VALUES ($1, 'recursos', $2::timestamptz) ON CONFLICT (company_name, entity) DO UPDATE SET last_sync_at = EXCLUDED.last_sync_at;
